page.title: 05Languages in my area.
page.content: In this area lots of people speak {English}only as{a second language.}We made a survey of our class and found out that 21 people speak{Punjabi,}3 speak{Urdu,}3 speak{Bengali,}2 speak {Pushto,}1 speaks{Yugoslavian}and two speak{English,}making a total of 32. In my house I speak English to my sisters and to my brothers,but to my Mum I speak Punjabi.On my table at school 3 people speak Urdu and 2 speak Punjabi.Only one person speaks Pushto. My friend Wajeea speaks Urdu.Her uncle can read and speak{Arabic.}My teacher is English and so are all the rest of the teachers apart from Mrs. Shah and Mrs. Qureshi who speak Urdu.There is a girl in our class called Suzanna Kolar who speaks Yugoslavian.She is the only one who speaks Yugoslavian in this area.
